    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AudioManager
    Works through a Singleton Design Pattern Centralized audio manager for the Tetris game.
    AudioSettingsController
    Controller for the Audio Settings screen with volume sliders.
    Board
    Defines the contract for a game board in a Tetris-like game.
    Brick
    Defines the contract for a generic brick in the game.
    BrickGenerator
    Defines the contract for generating bricks in the game.
    BrickRotator
    - Handles rotation state of the current falling brick.
    ClearRow
    A data class representing the result of a row clearing operation on the game board.
    Constants
    A utility class containing constant values used throughout the Tetris game.
    DownData
    - Immutable value object returned after a downward movement (soft drop or hard drop).
    EventSource
    Enumeration representing the source of a game event.
    EventType
    Enumeration representing different types of movement or action events in the game.
    GameBoard
    Represents the game board logic for a Tetris-like game.
    GameBoardView
    Manages the background grid, the display matrix of landed blocks, and size constants.
    GameController
    - Acts as the controller for core gameplay actions.
    GameOverPanel
    A simple JavaFX panel to display a "GAME OVER" message.
    GameSettings
    Singleton class managing game settings with persistence.
    GhostCalculator
    A utility class responsible for calculating the position of the "ghost" piece (the projected landing spot of the current falling brick) on the game board.
    GuiController
    Controller class managing high-level UI interaction, state, and delegating rendering responsibilities to dedicated view components (GameBoardView, NextPieceView).
    HelpDialog
    A utility class for displaying a help dialog with game controls and scoring information.
    HighScorePersistence
    - Handles persistence of high score to disk.
    InputEventListener
    Defines the contract for an input event listener in the game.
    Main
    The main entry point for the TetrisJFX application.
    MainMenuController
    Controller for the main menu of the TetrisJFX application.
    MatrixOperations
    - Utility class containing static operations for matrix copying, collision detection, brick merging, and row clearing.
    MoveEvent
    - Immutable input descriptor sent from the UI layer to the game logic.
    MusicType
    Enumeration of different music types/states in the game.
    NextPieceView
    Manages the display of the next falling piece preview.
    NextShapeInfo
    - Represents the next rotation state of a brick.
    NotificationPanel
    A custom JavaFX BorderPane extension used to display transient notifications, such as scores, with animation effects.
    PieceManager
    Manages the active falling brick, including its movement, rotation, spawning of new bricks, and interaction with the game board.
    PieceRenderer
    Utility class to manage Tetris brick colors and styling.
    PlayerStats
    Singleton class managing player statistics with persistence.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    An implementation of BrickGenerator that provides bricks in a random sequence.
    Score
    - Manages all scoring logic for the Tetris game.
    SettingsController
    Controller for the Settings menu screen.
    SimpleBoard
    An implementation of the Board interface, providing the core game logic for a Tetris-like game.
    SoundEffect
    Enumeration of all sound effects used in the game.
    StatsController
    Controller for the Player Statistics screen.
    TBrick
    Represents the T-shaped brick ("T-Tetromino") in the game.
    Theme
    Enum representing available visual themes for the game.
    ThemeManager
    Manages the application of different visual themes to JavaFX scenes.
    ViewData
    - Immutable data snapshot passed from the game logic layer to the UI.
